00021 class Document_modele {
00022         var $cn;        // database conx
00023         var $md_id;     // md_id
00024         var $md_name;   // template's name
00025         var $md_type;   // template's type (letter, invoice, order...)
00026         var $md_lob;    //Document file
00027         //Constructor parameter = database connexion
00028         function Document_modele($p_cn,$p_id=-1) {
00029                 $this->cn=$p_cn;        
00030                 $this->md_id=$p_id;
00031         }
00032 
00033  /* function 
00034  **************************************************
00035  * Purpose : show all the stored document_modele.
00036  *        return a string containing all the data
00037  *        separate by TD & TR tag
00038  * parm : 
00039  *      - 
00040  * gen :
00041  *      -
00042  * return:
00043  */
00044         function myList() { 
00045           $sql="select md_id,md_name from document_modele";
00046           $Res=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00047           $all=pg_fetch_all($Res);
00048           if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) return "";
00049           foreach ( $all as $row) {
00050             var_dump($row);
00051           } 
00052         }
00053 /* function Save
00054  **************************************************
00055  * Purpose :  Save a document_modele in the database, 
00056  *       if the document_modele doesn't exist yet it will be
00057  *       first created (-> insert into document_modele)
00058  *       in that case the name and the type must be set
00059  *       set before calling Save, the name will be modified
00060  *       with FormatString
00061  *        
00062  * parm : 
00063  *      - none
00064  * gen :
00065  *      - none
00066  * return:
00067  *     - none
00068  */
00069         function Save() 
00070           {
00071             // Values are in $_POST
00072             StartSql($this->cn);
00073             // Save data into the table invoice
00074             // if $this->md_id == -1 it means it is a new document model
00075             // so first we have to insert it
00076             // the name and the type must be set before calling save
00077             if ( $this->md_id == -1) 
00078               {
00079                 $this->name=FormatString($this->name);
00080                 $this->md_id=NextSequence('document_modele_md_id_seq');
00081                 $sql=sprintf("insert into document_modele(md_id,md_name,md_type) 
00082                               values (%d,'%s',%d)",
00083                              $this->md_id,$this->name,$this->md_type);
00084                 $Ret=ExecSql($this->cn,$sql);
00085               }
00086             // Save the file
00087             $new_name=tempnam('/tmp','document_');
00088             echo_debug('class_document_modele.php',__LINE__,"new name=".$new_name);
00089             if ( strlen ($_FILES['doc']['tmp_name']) != 0 ) 
00090               {
00091                 if (move_uploaded_file($_FILES['doc']['tmp_name'],
00092                                        $new_name)) 
00093                   {
00094                     // echo "Image saved";
00095                     $oid= pg_lo_import($this->cn,$new_name);
00096                     if ( $oid == false ) 
00097                       {
00098                         echo_error('class_document_modele.php',__LINE__,"cannot upload document");
00099                         Rollback($cn);
00100                         return;
00101                       }
00102                     echo_debug('class_document_modele.php',__LINE__,"Loading document");
00103                     // Remove old document
00104                     $ret=ExecSql($this->cn,"select md_file from invoice where md_id=".$this->md_id);
00105                     if (pg_num_rows($ret) != 0) 
00106                         {
00107                           $r=pg_fetch_array($ret,0);
00108                           $old_oid=$r['iv_file'];
00109                           if (strlen($old_oid) != 0) 
00110                             pg_lo_unlink($this->cn,$old_oid);
00111                         }
00112                     // Load new document
00113                     ExecSql($this->cn,"update document_modele set md_lob where md_id=".$this->md_id);
00114                   }
00115                 else 
00116                   {
00117                     echo "<H1>Error</H1>";
00118                     Rollback($this->cn);
00119                     exit;
00120                   }
00121               }
00122           }
00123         // Remove a template

00126           }

00130           {
00131                 $r="";
00132                 $r='<FORM METHOD="POST" ACTION="dossier_prefs.php">';
00133                 $r.="</FORM>";
00134                 return $r;
00135           }
00136         // return the string containing the form for
00137         // removing a template
00138         function FormDelete() {
00139         }
00140         // Parse and remplace the tag in the invoice 
00141         // By the value found in quant_sold
00142         // p_id is the id of the invoice
00143         // p_internal reference (quant_sold qs_internal)
00144         function Get($p_id,$p_internal) 
00145         {
00146         // retrieve info from the table invoice
00147                 
00148         // retrieve the template and generate document
00149                 StartSql($this->cn);
00150                 $ret=ExecSql($cn,"select iv_name,iv_file from invoice where iv_id".$this->iv_id);
00151                 if ( pg_num_rows ($ret) == 0 )
00152                         return;
00153                 $row=pg_fetch_array($ret,0);
00154                 //the template is saved into file $tmp
00155                 $tmp=tempnam('/tmp/','invoice_');
00156                 pg_lo_export($cn,$row['iv_file'],$tmp);
00157                 // Parse the file 
00158 
00159 
00160 
00161 
00162                 // send it to stdout
00163                 ini_set('zlib.output_compression','Off');
00164                 header("Pragma: public");
00165                 header("Expires: Mon, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT");
00166                 header("Last-Modified: " . gmdate("D, d M Y H:i:s") . " GMT");
00167                 header("Cache-Control: must-revalidate");
00168                 header('Content-type: rtf/x-application');
00169                 header('Content-Disposition: attachment;filename="invoice'.$p_internal.'.rtf"',FALSE);
00170                 header("Accept-Ranges: bytes");
00171                 $file=fopen($tmp,'r');
00172                 while ( !feof ($file) )
00173                 {
00174                         echo fread($file,8192);
00175                 }
00176                 fclose($file);
00177                 
00178                 unlink ($tmp);
00179                 
00180                 Commit($cn);
00181 
00182         }
00183 }
